tool_description: Multilingual API for translating large and small texts from $0.2 / per million characters
name: Multilingual Translate Service
title: Multilingual Translate Service

api_list.name: Full list of available languages
api_list.description: Language list for translation into both directions
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://multilingual-translate-service.p.rapidapi.com/GetLangs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multilingual-translate-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://multilingual-translate-service.p.rapidapi.com/GetLangs"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "multilingual-translate-service.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
